DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to investigate if magnet therapy is effective as an alternative therapy for CTS.
DOC.brief_title: Static Magnetic Therapy for Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of mild to moderate Carpal Tunnel Syndrome by history, clinical exam and Electromyography (EMG) study. â‰¥ 18 years Current use of magnets as therapy for Carpal Tunnel Syndrome Known allergy to silicone Unwillingness to wear wristband for 6 weeks Patients who have devices that may be affected by exposure to magnets such as vagal nerve stimulator, pacemaker or insulin pump.
